event.title: 17 January 1968 the former municipality of Bramois merged

data.event: On 17 January 1968 the former municipality of Bramois merged into the municipality of Sion.

event.title: 1 January 2013 the former municipality of Salins merged

data.event: On 1 January 2013 the former municipality of Salins merged into the municipality of Sion.
The oldest trace of human settlement comes from 6200 BC during the late Mesolithic.

event.title: 5800 BC early Neolithic farmers from the Mediterranean settled

data.event: Around 5800 BC early Neolithic farmers from the Mediterranean settled in Sion.
The settlements remained small until about 4500 BC, during the middle Neolithic, when the number of settlements increased sharply.

event.title: the beginning of the Early Bronze Age (around 2300 BC

data.event: At the beginning of the Early Bronze Age (around 2300 BC) the last stelae were erected.
